name: Spa & Makeup Dress up
description:
From the creators of A-list Girl: Spa & Beauty Salon, Nail Salon and Hair Salon we present:

* Makeup Makeover *

You're a star! Get ready to an A-list Hollywood event with this beautiful girl game!
Go to the spa salon, treat your self like a princess, make amazing makeovers and dress like a star girl!
You will be the jewel of the party, you will be the eye candy to everyone, the barbie for the girls.

- Pamper,wash and clean your skin with amazing spa treatment, remember there's no need to run or get angry, just relax in this luxurious spa

- Create different looks doing amazing makeup, vibrant colors, eyeliner, lipstick, blush, different hair types will make you look like a mermaid, heroes are made of beauty, make your pet princess be the hero of the party!

- Dress up your barbie doll with glamorous clothes, there's only one princess in the end, one star girl that will crush everyone at the party, YOU!


Good game appropriate for kids and girls all ages.

Enjoy this great saga! This game for girls is free and cute! Have fun!
